Rules.InvariantScript: If(!IsBlank(BrowseGallery1.Selected) && DataSourceInfo([@'Web Team Project Portfolio'], DataSourceInfo.DeletePermission), DisplayMode.Edit, DisplayMode.Disabled)
Remove([@'Web Team Project Portfolio'], BrowseGallery1.Selected); If (IsEmpty(Errors([@'Web Team Project Portfolio'], BrowseGallery1.Selected)), Back())
If(DataSourceInfo([@'Web Team Project Portfolio'], DataSourceInfo.EditPermission), DisplayMode.Edit, DisplayMode.Disabled)
